content:
The chunk represents a comprehensive list of common performance issues in 3D rendering and game development, serving as an organized summary at the end of the document.

too-many-meshes too-many-state-changes too-many-text-updates too-many-shader-instructions excessive-fill memory-full python-calculation failure-to-garbage-collect collision-system-misuse motherboard-integrated-video too-many-polygons miscellaneous
